original_text: The people that have lent their riches to you will suddenly attack. They will come to take back their things and you will be very afraid. Now they will come to rob you! The people that have lent their riches to you will suddenly attack. They will come to take back their things and you will be very afraid. Now they will come to rob you!
korean_text: 너를 억누를 자들이 갑자기 일어나지 않겠느냐 너를 괴롭힐 자들이 깨어나지 않겠느냐 네가 그들에게 노략을 당하지 않겠느냐

sentences.original_text: The people that have lent their riches to you
They will come to take back their things
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 와서 자기 것을 도로 가져가고

sentences.original_text: and you will be very afraid
Now they will come to rob you
sentences.korean_translation: 이제 그들이 와서 너를 약탈할 것이다
